summary: Diff implements the requested per-food quantity+unit editing, baseline serving metadata persistence, serving-multiplier math with safe fallbacks, and enhanced free-text parsing with inline units. Meal/food nutrition display and aggregation are updated to use scaled nutrients.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified a footer attribution link (“Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai”) on the main page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-25/26/27 (scope is quantity/unit editing, conversion metadata, and parsing).
